frequency.label: Frequency
frequency.description: Select how frequently this connection will pull data from the asset

time.label: Time (UTC)
time.description: Set the UTC time to run connector to pull data from data source

host.label: Management IP address or hostname
host.description: Specify the IP address or hostname of the data source

port.label: Host port
port.description: Set the port number that is associated with the hostname or IP address

data_retention_period.label: Data retention period
data_retention_period.description: Specify the data retention period of the data source

key_name.label: Key Name
key_name.description: Unique identity Key Name of Nozomi API. It can be found in the API keys table under user profile in the Nozomi Vantage console

key_token.label: Key Token
key_token.description: Token code of Nozomi API client. It can be found while creating a API keys for user in Nozomi Vantage console
